newsitem.title: USA: Gold Capital says president/CEO resigns.
newsitem.headline: Gold Capital says president/CEO resigns.

text.p: Gold Capital Corp said Thursday that President and Chief Executive John Young has resigned.
Young also resigned as a director of the company, it said. His resignation was effective on Wednesday.
Young also is president and chief executive of Royalstar Resources Ltd, the owner of about 63 percent of Gold Capital.
The remaining three directors of Gold Capital have created an executive committee of the board of directors to assume the operations of the company, it said.
The committee will look for a successor, Gold Capital said.
